remarks: Sufficient condition for transforming the index set of an eventually bounded function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2016.)
statement:
o1co.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
o1co.2 $e |- ( ph -> F e. O(1) ) $.
o1co.3 $e |- ( ph -> G : B --> A ) $.
o1co.4 $e |- ( ph -> B C_ RR ) $.
o1co.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ m e. RR ) -> E. x e. RR A. y e. B ( x <_ y -> m <_ ( G ` y ) ) ) $.
o1co $p |- ( ph -> ( F o. G ) e. O(1) ) $.
$d A m x y $.
$d B m x y $.
$d F m x y $.
$d G m x y $.
$d m ph x y $.
